content.question: The trend shown in the map led most directly to which of the following?

choices.label: A decreasing gap in wealth because land ownership increased among White citizens
Decreasing tensions between White settlers and Native Americans because expanded United States territory undercut competition
Increasing divisions between North and South because of questions about the status of slavery in new territories
Increasing legal immigration for Asians because the United States became a Pacific Rim country

content.answer: Increasing divisions between North and South because of questions about the status of slavery in new territories

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
